verse: भुजगतल्प गतम् घनसुंदरम् गरुड़ वाहनम् भुजलोचनम् जलधिजाश्रीत बाम कलेवरम, भजते रे मनुजा कमला पतिम

words.जलधिजाश्रीत: goddess of wealth arising from the ocean

overall_meaning: O humans, worship the husband of Lakshmi, adorned with serpents, having a dense and beautiful form, riding Garuda, lotus-eyed, wearing left-sided conch, and praised by the goddess of wealth arising from the ocean.
